name: Figma (npx)
description: Read and inspect Figma designs, components, and styles. Extract layout details, design tokens, and asset metadata from any Figma file. Translates auto-layout to CSS flexbox. Supports image downloads.

inputs.label: Figma Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Personal access token for the Figma API. Generated from your Figma account settings under Settings > Account > Personal access tokens.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to figma.com and log in
2. Open Settings > Account
3. Scroll to Personal access tokens
4. Click 'Generate new token'
5. Give it a description and copy the token

auth.instructions: Generate a personal access token at figma.com under Settings > Account > Personal access tokens
